topics.body:
"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554a0397636872562fc40000#post_554a0397636872562fc40000
Call me crazy, but I would not be surprised if we wind up like Japan at this rate socially where government constantly fucks up, their fuck ups fuck up society and rather than dealing with the problem they just pass the blame.

The percentage of adults that are unmarried is rapidly rising, so I can see this further increasing the percentage of adults that are unmarried drastically in the long run.

2025 congress:
"Fuck you liberals!  This is your fault that married is a dead!"
"Fuck you conservatives!  This is your fault that the percentage of adults that are married is only 10%!"
"fuck you!"
"fuck you!"

It's pretty safe to say that marriage is dying in the usa, not cause of <insert bullshit here> but rather congress keeps fucking up and taxing it to death.  If you wanted to promote people to marry you don't tax them more for marrying and having kids.




So the latest RVB video had a hilarious moment that is probably going to be under-rated.  Side note: Junior would be a amazing basketball player.
